article_title: Mexican Satellite Lost as Russian Rocket Fails After Launch
article_text:
MEXICO CITY—A Russian-made rocket carrying a Mexican communications satellite into orbit failed minutes after launch from Kazakhstan on Saturday, causing the loss of the satellite, the Mexican government said.

The company responsible for the launch, International Launch Services, said the rocket failed about eight minutes after liftoff from the...
